QuestData.Title: Harpy Culling
QuestData.Description:
The harpies are preparing for a dreadful assault, $n.
They plan to attack our allies back at camp!
Harpies swoop in and snatch their victims before bringing them back to their nests... to feast.
We have to stop them. Slay the harpies and their worgs to ensure their forces are too weak to stage an assault.
QuestData.RewardText: That should keep our camp safe for now. We must hurry and stop whatever these ogres have planned.
